scripts.clean:app: del tmp-release-* アニメ画像に変換する君* AnimationImageConverter*
scripts.copy:release:app-mac: npm run copy:release:app && node-mv tmp-release tmp-release-mac
scripts.copy:release:bin-mac: mkdir tmp-release-mac/bin/ && npm run copy:release:webp-mac && npm run copy:release:apngasm-mac & npm run copy:release:pngquant-mac
scripts.package-mac: electron-packager ./tmp-release-mac 'アニメ画像に変換する君' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --overwrite --asar --icon='resources/app.icns'  --version='1.2.3'
scripts.release-mac: npm run clean:app && npm run build:app && npm run copy:release:app-mac && npm run copy:release:bin-mac && npm run install:package-mac && npm run package-mac
scripts.package-mas: electron-packager ./tmp-release-mac 'アニメ画像に変換する君' --platform=mas --overwrite  --arch=x64 --app-bundle-id='media.ics.AnimationImageConverter'  --extend-info=dev/Info.plist  --version='1.2.3'  --app-version='1.0.0' --build-version='1.0.202' --icon='resources/app.icns' --overwrite
scripts.sign-mas: electron-osx-sign 'アニメ画像に変換する君-mas-x64/アニメ画像に変換する君.app' --entitlements='dev/parent.plist' --entitlements-inherit='dev/child.plist'
scripts.package-sign-mas: npm run package-mas && npm run sign-mas
scripts.flat: electron-osx-flat 'アニメ画像に変換する君-mas-x64/アニメ画像に変換する君.app' --identity '3rd Party Mac Developer Installer: ICS INC. (53YCXL8YSM)' --verbose --pkg AnimationImageConverter.pkg
scripts.release-mas: npm run clean:app && npm run build:app && npm run copy:release:app-mac && npm run copy:release:bin-mac && npm run install:package-mac && npm run package-sign-mas && npm run flat
scripts.copy:release:app-win32: npm run copy:release:app && node-mv tmp-release tmp-release-win32
scripts.copy:release:bin-win32: mkdir tmp-release-win32/bin/ && npm run copy:release:webp-win32 && npm run copy:release:apngasm-win32 & npm run copy:release:pngquant-win32
scripts.release-win32: npm run clean:app && npm run build:app && npm run copy:release:app-win32 && npm run copy:release:bin-win32 && npm run package-win32
